title: New Criminal Probe of Trump Organization
itunes:title: New Criminal Probe of Trump Organization
description:
Greg Farrell, Bloomberg Legal Reporter, discusses the New York Attorney General opening a criminal probe of the Trump Organization.

Greg Bordelon, a professor at the University of Maine School of Law, discusses what a last name is worth in a divorce.

June Grasso hosts

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
